name: Pius
greetingText: Cheers to another trip around the sun! Keep shining!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text1: It's your birthday!!! :Gosh I can't keep calm...
textInChatBox: Your birthday is the perfect time to recognize all your wonderful qualities, including the fact that you have a better life than me and many other. you just don't see it
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, You are also a tech Guru!
outroText: To many more brighter days full of success and hoppiness.
replayText: Click if you want to watch it again.
